title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2400.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2400.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

When used in this Chapter, the following terms shall have the
following meanings: (a) Act shall mean
the New York State Financial Emergency Act for the City of New York as enacted
by section 2 of chapter 868 of the Laws of 1975, as amended. (b) Board shall mean the New York State

Emergency Financial Control Board created by the Act. (c) City shall mean the City of New

York. (d) Covered organization shall
have the same meaning as prescribed for that term in section 2 of the
act. (e) Emergency period shall have
the same meaning as prescribed for that term in section 2 of the act. (f) Executive director shall mean the
executive director of the board. (h) Financial plan shall have the same meaning as prescribed for that term in
section 2 of the act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2400.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
